33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said: 'There was no Prophet except that he warned his Ummah of the liar who is blind in one eye. Lo! He is blind in one eye, and your Lord is not blind in one eye. Written between his eyes is: Kafir

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَتْلِ عِيسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ الدَّجَّالَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'Eisa Bin Maryam killing the Dajjal
